summary.span: 表示 Windows 控制項，其允許使用者使用視覺化月曆顯示來選取日期。

span.span: Represents a Windows control that enables the user to select a date using a visual monthly calendar display.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項可讓使用者選取日期，使用的視覺顯示。The control allows the user to select a date using a visual display. 您可以限制日期和時間可以藉由設定選取和屬性。You can limit the date and times that can be selected by setting the and properties. 您可以變更尋找 控制項的行事曆部分的設定， ， ， ， ，和屬性。You can change the look of the calendar portion of the control by setting the , , , , , and properties. > [!NOTE] > 控制項僅支援西曆。The control only supports Gregorian calendars. > [!NOTE] > 控制項僅支援西曆。The control only supports Gregorian calendars. 繪製控制項的作業系統，所以永遠不會引發事件。The control is drawn by the operating system, so the event is never raised. 如果您要提供自訂的外觀控制項，您應該會覆寫方法呼叫的基底實作，然後再執行自訂繪製。If you need to provide a customized look to the control, you should override the method, call the base implementation of , and then perform custom painting. 如果您需要自訂的日期格式設定和選取範圍限制為只有一個日期，您可以考慮使用而不是控制。If you need custom date formatting and a selection limited to just one date, you might consider using a control instead of a . 使用消除許多需要驗證的日期/時間值。Using the eliminates much of the need for validating date/time values. 如需有關月份行事曆控制項，請參閱[月份行事曆控制參考](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178863)。For more information on month calendar controls, see [Month Calendar Control Reference](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=178863). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示一個表單，其中包含會顯示一個日曆年度的控制項。The following code example displays a form containing a control that displays one calendar year. 此範例示範設定， ， ， ， ，和屬性，以自訂行事曆控制項的外觀。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , , and properties to customize the look of the calendar control. 其他屬性，例如， ，和設自訂的日期會以粗體顯示。Other properties such as , , and are set to customize which dates are bold. 此範例也設定， ， ，和屬性，以變更行事曆格式。The example also sets the , , , and properties to change the calendar format. 和也會處理事件和其狀態會顯示在表單上。The and events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form. summary.span: 取得或設定控制項的背景色彩。

span.span: Gets or sets the background color for the control.
A that represents the background color of the control.

value.span: 預設值為 屬性的值。

span.span: The default is the value of the property.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性不支援透明的色彩，除非`SupportsTransparentBackColor`值設`true`。The property does not support transparent colors unless the `SupportsTransparentBackColor` value of is set to `true`. 屬性是環境的屬性。The property is an ambient property. 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，具有相同做為其父系預設。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 如需環境屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱類別或類別概觀。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. 從開始使用 Windows Vista，並根據佈景主題，設定這個屬性可能不會變更行事曆外觀。Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar. 例如，如果您可以設定 Windows 使用 Aero 的佈景主題，設定此屬性沒有任何作用。For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect. 這是因為在執行階段衍生自目前作業系統的佈景主題的外觀呈現行事曆的更新的版本。This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme. 如果您想要使用這個屬性並啟用行事曆的舊版，您可以停用您的應用程式視覺化樣式。If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application. 停用視覺化樣式，可能會影響的外觀和行為的應用程式中其他控制項。Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application. 若要停用在 Visual Basic 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 專案設計工具並取消核取**啟用 XP 視覺化樣式**核取方塊。To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box. 若要停用 C# 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 Program.cs 並標記為註解`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定和預設系統色彩的控制項。The following code example sets the and of the controls to the default system colors. 如果控制項的任何子控制項，則程式碼以遞迴方式呼叫其本身。The code recursively calls itself if the control has any child controls. 這個程式碼範例需要您具有與至少一個子系控制項; 不過，子容器控制，例如或，使用自己的子系控制項會進一步示範遞迴。This code example requires that you have a with at least one child control; however, a child container control, like a or , with its own child control(s) would better demonstrate the recursion. remarks.format: ## Remarks 只有一個日曆年度會顯示一次，而且可以顯示之月份的數目上限為 12。Only one calendar year is displayed at a time, and the maximum number of months that can be displayed is 12. 有效的資料行和資料列組合進行 12; 最大產品如需大於 12 的值，顯示會修改自動調整為基礎。Valid combinations of columns and rows make a maximum product of 12; for values greater than 12, the display is modified on a best-fit basis. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示一個表單，其中包含會顯示一個日曆年度的控制項。The following code example displays a form containing a control that displays one calendar year. 此範例示範設定， ， ， ， ，和屬性，以自訂行事曆控制項的外觀。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , , and properties to customize the look of the calendar control. 其他屬性，例如， ，和設自訂的日期會以粗體顯示。Other properties such as , , and are set to customize which dates are bold. 此範例也設定， ， ，和屬性，以變更行事曆格式。The example also sets the , , , and properties to change the calendar format. 和也會處理事件和其狀態會顯示在表單上。The and events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法所傳回的執行個體會提供正確值， ，以及 < System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject.Role > 屬性。The instance returned by this method provides correct values for the , , and properties. 新值屬性是，新值屬性是目前的選取範圍，以及新的預設值為屬性為型別名稱。The new value for the property is , the new value for the property is the current selection, and the new default value for the property is the type name. ，才可以重新撰寫以.NET Framework 4.7.1 為目標，或可選擇要使用相容性參數，在.NET Framework 4.7.1 中加入的.NET Framework 協助工具功能的應用程式中使用。The is only available in applications that are recompiled to target the .NET Framework 4.7.1 or that opt in to the .NET Framework accessibility features added in the .NET Framework 4.7.1 by using a compatibility switch. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱中的 Windows Form 區段[重定目標變更從.NET Framework 4.7 移轉到 4.7.1](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/retargeting/4.7-4.7.1.md#windows-forms)。For more information, see the Windows Forms section in [Retargeting Changes for Migration from .NET Framework 4.7 to 4.7.1](~/docs/framework/migration-guide/retargeting/4.7-4.7.1.md#windows-forms).

summary.span: 發生於 中選取的日期變更時。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 期間選取任何日期發生的滑鼠、 鍵盤或程式碼的事件。The event occurs during any date selection, whether by mouse, keyboard, or code. 事件類似，但它只會在使用滑鼠選取日期的結束時發生。The event is similar, but it occurs only at the end of a date selection made using the mouse. 如需處理事件的詳細資訊，請參閱[處理和引發事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會建立，設定其和屬性，並指派至屬性控制項。The following code example creates a , sets its and properties, and assigns the to the property of the control. 當引發事件時，和屬性值會顯示在文字方塊中。When the event is raised, the and property values are displayed in the text boxes. 這個範例需要您有具有兩個控制項，和控制項。This example requires that you have a with two controls, a , and a control. remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是環境的屬性。The property is an ambient property. 環境屬性是控制項屬性，如果未設定，將擷取從父控制項。An ambient property is a control property that, if not set, is retrieved from the parent control. 例如，具有相同做為其父系預設。For example, a will have the same as its parent by default. 如需環境屬性的詳細資訊，請參閱類別或類別概觀。For more information about ambient properties, see the class or the class overview. 從開始使用 Windows Vista，並根據佈景主題，設定這個屬性可能不會變更行事曆外觀。Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar. 例如，如果您可以設定 Windows 使用 Aero 的佈景主題，設定此屬性沒有任何作用。For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect. 這是因為在執行階段衍生自目前作業系統的佈景主題的外觀呈現行事曆的更新的版本。This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme. 如果您想要使用這個屬性並啟用行事曆的舊版，您可以停用您的應用程式視覺化樣式。If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application. 停用視覺化樣式，可能會影響的外觀和行為的應用程式中其他控制項。Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application. 若要停用在 Visual Basic 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 專案設計工具並取消核取**啟用 XP 視覺化樣式**核取方塊。To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box. 若要停用 C# 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 Program.cs 並標記為註解`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會設定和預設系統色彩的控制項。The following code example sets the and of the controls to the default system colors. 如果控制項的任何子控制項，則程式碼以遞迴方式呼叫其本身。The code recursively calls itself if the control has any child controls. 這個程式碼範例需要您具有與至少一個子系控制項; 不過，子容器控制，例如或，使用自己的子系控制項會進一步示範遞迴。This code example requires that you have a with at least one child control; however, a child container control, like a or , with its own child control(s) would better demonstrate the recursion. [!code-cpp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CPP/controlproperties.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/CS/controlproperties.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Windows.Forms.Control Properties#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/Windows.Forms.Control Properties/VB/controlproperties.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設定這個屬性是在功能上相當於使用方法。Setting this property is functionally equivalent to using the method. 您可以分別設定開始和結束日期，藉由設定 或屬性。You can set the start and end dates separately by setting either the or properties. 您無法變更開始和結束日期，藉由設定或屬性值屬性。You cannot change the start and end dates by setting the or property values of the property. 您應該使用， ，或。You should use , , or . 如果屬性值大於其屬性值，就會交換日期;屬性值就是開始日期，以及屬性值變成結束日期。If the property value of the is greater than its property value, the dates are swapped; the property value becomes the starting date, and property value becomes the end date. > [!NOTE] > 捲動瀏覽按鈕的行事曆顯示選取範圍時，可能會導致非預期的結果 （例如，日期不會保留範圍）。Scrolling through the calendar display with the navigation buttons when a range is selected can cause unexpected results (for example, the date range is not preserved). 如果您有各種 04/01/2001 到 04/10/2001年顯示單一月份，捲動年 3 月的行事曆會選取的範圍變更，如下所示： 03/01/2001 到 03/10/2001年。If you have a single month displayed with a range of 04/01/2001 to 04/10/2001, scrolling the calendar to March changes the selected range as follows: 03/01/2001 to 03/10/2001. 如果您有數個月顯示，例如年 3 月和年 4 月 04/01/2001 04/10/2001，來選取範圍回到一月和二月日曆捲動會選取的範圍變更，如下所示： 01/01/2001 至 01/10/2001年。If you have multiple months displayed, such as March and April with a selected range of 04/01/2001 to 04/10/2001, scrolling the calendar back to January and February changes the selected range as follows: 01/01/2001 to 01/10/2001. > [!NOTE] > 設定如啟用視覺化樣式的控制項將會導致不正確地繪製在控制項上的選取範圍。Setting the for a control that has visual styles enabled will result in the selection range not painting correctly on the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 週日期文字的字型色彩取決於屬性。The font color of the days-of-the-week text depends on the property. 設定等於用主要顯示器的行事曆區域會使得的週天文字變成無法讀取。Setting the equal to the for the main display area of the calendar causes the days-of-the-week text to become unreadable. 從開始使用 Windows Vista，並根據佈景主題，設定這個屬性可能不會變更行事曆外觀。Starting with Windows Vista and depending on the theme, setting this property might not change the appearance of the calendar. 例如，如果您可以設定 Windows 使用 Aero 的佈景主題，設定此屬性沒有任何作用。For example, if Windows is set to use the Aero theme, setting this property has no effect. 這是因為在執行階段衍生自目前作業系統的佈景主題的外觀呈現行事曆的更新的版本。This is because an updated version of the calendar is rendered with an appearance that is derived at run time from the current operating system theme. 如果您想要使用這個屬性並啟用行事曆的舊版，您可以停用您的應用程式視覺化樣式。If you want to use this property and enable the earlier version of the calendar, you can disable visual styles for your application. 停用視覺化樣式，可能會影響的外觀和行為的應用程式中其他控制項。Disabling visual styles might affect the appearance and behavior of other controls in your application. 若要停用在 Visual Basic 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 專案設計工具並取消核取**啟用 XP 視覺化樣式**核取方塊。To disable visual styles in Visual Basic, open the Project Designer and uncheck the **Enable XP visual styles** check box. 若要停用 C# 中的視覺化樣式，請開啟 Program.cs 並標記為註解`Application.EnableVisualStyles();`。To disable visual styles in C#, open Program.cs and comment out `Application.EnableVisualStyles();`. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例會顯示一個表單，其中包含會顯示一個日曆年度的控制項。The following code example displays a form containing a control that displays one calendar year. 此範例示範設定， ， ， ， ，和屬性，以自訂行事曆控制項的外觀。The example demonstrates setting the , , , , , and properties to customize the look of the calendar control. 其他屬性，例如， ，和設自訂的日期會以粗體顯示。Other properties such as , , and are set to customize which dates are bold. 此範例也設定， ， ，和屬性，以變更行事曆格式。The example also sets the , , , and properties to change the calendar format. 和也會處理事件和其狀態會顯示在表單上。The and events are also handled and their status is displayed on the form.
